column4: Hey anything i can "apt-get" in Ubuntu, i can "apt-get" in lubuntu, yes? :o
yes, they use the same repository
yay! i tried to get over Unity but just couldnt so im switching to lubuntu ^^
good choice, i prefer xfce myself, but i agree that unity is not for me
you can't go 64bit if your processor doesn't support it anyway
ah, good, i've used 64bit for years, its great
from a user perspective you likely won't notice any difference
maybe if you provide examples we can help
no backups mean you don't consider your data important, hope you know what you are doing
you can upgrade when it comes out
apt-get upgrade installs updates for your current version, it will not upgrade you to the next version
